features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User authentication with Supabase including sign up, sign in, sign out, password reset, and email confirmation. Supports mock mode fallback.

features.name: Practice Session Flow
features.description: AI-powered practice sessions with patient simulation, chat interface, voice input, timer, and session management.

features.name: Subscription and Payment Flow
features.description: Stripe integration for premium subscriptions with checkout, webhooks, tier management, and subscription cancellation.

features.name: Navigation and Routing
features.description: View-based navigation system with bottom navigation bar, view renderer, and routing logic.

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard showing session statistics, practice history, and quick actions.

features.name: Gamification System
features.description: XP, badges, streaks, and level progression to motivate users.

features.name: Coaching Reports
features.description: AI-generated coaching summaries and detailed reports for premium users.

features.name: Resource Library
features.description: Educational content library with MI resources, some premium-gated.

features.name: Scenario Selection
features.description: Premium feature allowing users to filter and select specific patient scenarios.

features.name: Database Service
features.description: Supabase database operations for user profiles, sessions, and data persistence.

features.name: AI Services
features.description: Google Gemini AI integration for patient responses, feedback generation, and coaching summaries.

features.name: State Management
features.description: Application state management using React hooks and custom hooks.

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components including buttons, cards, modals, loading spinners, and form inputs.

features.name: Onboarding
features.description: New user onboarding flow to introduce the application.

features.name: Support and Legal
features.description: Support page and legal pages including privacy policy, terms of service, and cookie policy.

features.name: Feedback Service
features.description: In-app feedback collection system for user ratings and comments.

features.name: PWA Support
features.description: Progressive Web App features including service worker, offline support, and app manifest.

features.name: Edge Functions
features.description: Supabase Edge Functions for serverless backend operations including Stripe webhooks, coaching summaries, and subscription management.

features.name: Utilities
features.description: Utility functions for validation, error handling, and session management.

features.name: Setup and Configuration
features.description: Backend health checks and configuration validation.
